name: shoutout-monorepo
description: Hamster & Toast Desktop-App (Electron) + Node WebSocket Hub + Discord Bot

scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client -c "cyan,magenta" "npm --workspace server start" "npm --workspace client start"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client,bot -c "cyan,magenta,green" "npm --workspace server run dev" "npm --workspace client start" "npm --workspace bot run dev"
